mapper.insert: insert into tb_comment values(SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo},default,default, #{rUserId}, #{rContent}, sysdate, 'N', default )
mapper.select: select REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE, DECYN, COMMENTS_DELETE, USER_FILE, NICKNAME from tb_comment join tb_user using(user_ID) where comments_delete = 'N' and board_no = #{boardNo} order by REPLY_NO DESC
